availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jessamine county farmer. Married to Sally Hunter. Father to James William Cobb, Sophronia Cobb, Nathan Matthew Cobb, Henry S. Cobb, Nancy Ellen Cobb, Marietta Cobb, John Thomas Cobb, Nancy Cobb, Conrad Chrisman Cobb, and Fountain Robert Cobb.

bibl.p: 1860; Census Place: Jessamine, Kentucky; Roll: M653378; Page: 45; Family History Library Film: 803378. 1870; Census Place: District 3, Jessamine, Kentucky; Roll: M593477; Page: 28A; Image: 177582; Family History Library Film: 545976.
